{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-N11P.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N300 3-in-1 Router for Small Business and Home Network |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N11P-B1/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = Was |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RT-N11 |submodelappend = |submodel = P |revision = B1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 18, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RT-N11P_B1 |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RT1P00 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = AP-MT0P-C00H |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 575 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6KH-5; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 38:D5:47 |oui = 38:D5:47 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = |manuf = T&W |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan (WiP), OpenWrt (Was) |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP-MT0P-C00H", "REV1.0", "RoHS" and "1606" (02/2016) :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046796 FCC photos] ([[T&W]]). FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT1P00 MSQ-RT1P00] (2016-07-01) *Brand: ASUS *Product: Wireless-N Router *Test Model: [[ASUS RT-N300 B1|RT-N300 B1]] *Series Model: [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1|RT-N12+ B1]], [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3|RT-N12+ V3]] *Sample Status: Engineering sample Model: [[ASUS RT-N300 B1]] (US/CA) ([https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT1P00/Label/Label-Sample-3046798 Label Sample]) {{see also|ASUS RT-N11P|ASUS RT-N300}} Future support may be available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} ([https://n56u-v2.avh.od.ua/current/RT-N11P_B1/ WiP]) :The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. Default SSIDs are per the manual. ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63015:1298#1298 ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''iXBT''' forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-n11p_b1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Same hardware, firmware, and FCC ID with Asus RT-N12+ B1. Their FCC ID also used by RT-N300 B1 (Probably prototype or limited item sold in US/CA) }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info â€¢ >> |
export RT-N300_BASE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y 
  MT7628=y SSH=y EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y VPNC=y 
  SHP=y RTN11PB1=y ODMPID=y NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y REPEATER=y 
  RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y BTN_WPS_RST=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=n WAN_AT_P4=y LANWAN_LED=y BLINK_LED=y 
  SINGLE_2G=y YANDEXDNS=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y 
  REDIRECT_DNAME=y LAN50=y BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y NEWSSID_REV2=y 
  ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
	EDCCA_NEW=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI \
	DRAM=32M 

export RT-N11P_B1 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N11P_B1 += BUILD_NAME="RT-N11P_B1" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN11PB1=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"

export RT-N10P_V3 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N10P_V3 += BASE_MODEL="RT-N11P_B1" BUILD_NAME="RT-N10P_V3" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN10PV3=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"


/* ASUS RT-N11P B1 */

#define BOARD_PID		"RT-N11PB1"
#define BOARD_NAME		"RT-N11P_B1"
#define BOARD_DESC		"ASUS RT-N11P B1 Wireless Router"
#define BOARD_VENDOR_NAME	"ASUSTek Computer Inc."
#define BOARD_VENDOR_URL	"http://www.asus.com/"
#define BOARD_MODEL_URL		"http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N11P-B1/"
#define BOARD_BOOT_TIME		20
#define BOARD_FLASH_TIME	90
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_RESET	5
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_BTN_WPS
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ALL
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_WIFI	44
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_POWER	37
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_LAN	42
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN	43
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_USB
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ROUTER
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB
#define BOARD_HAS_5G_11AC	0
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_TX	0
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_RX	0
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ETH_LEDS	0
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_L1000	0
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_W1000	0


##################################################################
# Board PID    # Board Name         # PRODUCT # Note
##################################################################
# RT-N11P_B1   # ASUS RT-N11P B1    # MT7628  #
##################################################################

CFLAGS += -DBOARD_N11PB1 -DVENDOR_ASUS
BOARD_NUM_USB_PORTS=0
}} ==See also== * [[ASUS RT-N10P V3]] - N150 (150Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N10P-V3/ Product Page] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N (1T1R), Flash: 8MB, RAM: 32MB, PSU: 12V/0.5A * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ PPage] â€¢ [https://github.com/Linaro1985/padavan-ng/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards/ASUS/RT-N11P GitHub] * ASUS RT-N11P B1 - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N11P-B1/ PPage] â€¢ [https://github.com/Linaro1985/padavan-ng/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards/ASUS/RT-N11PB1 GitHub] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-B1/ PPage] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-V3/ PPage] * [[ASUS RT-N12E B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12E-B1/ PPage] * [[ASUS RT-N12E C1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12E-C1/ PPage] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ PPage] â€¢ [https://github.com/Linaro1985/padavan-ng/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards/ASUS/RT-N14U GitHub] * [[ASUS RT-N300]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ PPage] (US) * [[ASUS RT-N300 B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N300-B1/ PPage] * [[ASUS RT-N600]] - N600 (300+300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RTN600/ PPage] (US) * [[ASUS RT-AC1200]] - AC1200 (867+300Mbps) {{â€¢}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/ PPage] â€¢ [https://github.com/Linaro1985/padavan-ng/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards/ASUS/RT-AC1200 GitHub] [[Category:English Documentation]]
